description:
Do you enjoy the sound of a nice crackling fire? Have you noticed how relaxing it is to sleep next to a campfire? Ever shared a romantic evening drinking wine next to the warm glow of a fireplace?  Now you always can without the need of chopping wood, rolling newspaper, and finding matches. Eternal Fire will never go out unless your battery does. It also will save trees!

Features:

- Perfectly looped audio and video of fire
- Touch screen to create multiple sparks!
- Features the same fire sound used in our popular White Noise application!
- Multiple themes to place your fire in different locations such as the beach or fireplace

Enjoy your Eternal Fire!

Fan us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/tmsoft

Follow us on Twitter at http://twitter.com/tmsoft

Please download our free White Noise Lite for more great sounds!
